thread.title: Jennifer Love Hewitt lactation leakage: Star posts mishap to Twitter | The
thread.title_full: Jennifer Love Hewitt lactation leakage: Star posts mishap to Twitter | The Advertiser

author: Staff Writers
title: Jennifer Love Hewitt lactation leakage: Star posts mishap to Twitter | The
text:
JENNIFER Love Hewitt suffered an embarrassing mummy mishap during a fancy lunch.
The 36-year-old actress, who gave birth to her son Atticus James Hallisay in June, tweeted about the awkward incident to her 940,000 followers.
“Ventured out for first business lunch since baby boy arrived,” wrote the former Party of Five star.
“Lactated through silk jumpsuit mid meeting. Had to buy scarf for dignified exit.”
Hewitt accompanied the tweet with a selfie showing her wearing the strategically placed scarf.
In addition to their son Atticus, Hewitt and her hubby Brian Hallisay also have a daughter called Autumn James who was born in 2013.
Lactated through silk jumpsuit mid meeting. Had to buy scarf for dignified exit. #hotelgiftshop #mommylife pic.twitter.com/vU0HBmCrx3
— Jennifer Love Hewitt (@TheReal_Jlh) September 1, 2015 Jennifer Love Hewitt lactates through jumpsuit
